FinancialPlan.name: FinancialPlan
FinancialPlan.description: Represents a financial plan for a person account.

AccountId.description: The household to which the financial plan is associated.

Description.description: The description of the financial plan.

EstimatedSuccessPercent.description: The success percentage that's estimated for the financial plan.

Name.description: The name of the financial plan.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier for the financial plan in an external system.

StartDate.description: The start date of the financial plan.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the finanical plan.

Type.description: Specifies the type of financial plan.
